section.title: Drawing Data Structure
section.para: The data structure of a drawing can be represented as a tree using the "Composite" design pattern.

listitem.para: TreeNode is the interface type that realizes the "Composite" design pattern.
Figure is the interface type for all elements in a drawing, including the drawing itself.

section.title: Trade-off
section.para: This design implements the "Composite" design pattern in a two interfaces. This allows to separate the concern of representing a drawing element (by Figure) from the concern of representing a tree structure (by TreeNode).
